message: I'm excited to offer you the product for $13,000. I think it's a great deal, considering its value to you is $15,000. Let me know if you're interested!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're offering, I'm looking to get the product for closer to $12,500.  Let me know what you think!
I understand you're looking to get the product for $12,500, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $13,750. Let's see if we can make a deal!
